\begin{document}

\phantomsection\label{index::doc}


About EcoCache Foss4g Hackathon

The idea behind the Ecocache project was to capture useful information about the environment across the UK using easily identified object.
An example of this would be the flowering dates of Daffodils across the UK, which starts in the south of the UK and travels north.
By making this as an app for children the aim was to make something fun and engaging that would encourage kids to examine their
environment more closely whilst providing valueable data as the result.
THe aim is to mimic the ``Got to catch them all'' style of games with achievements and goals in a simple to use app that can be used
while in the car or out for a walk.

Contents:


\chapter{Table Structure}
\label{sql:welcome-to-ecocache-foss4g-hackathon-s-documentation}\label{sql::doc}\label{sql:table-structure}\begin{description}
\item[{The table structure to store and manage data acquisition are described below:}] \leavevmode
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\},numbers=left,firstnumber=1,stepnumber=1]
 \PYG{o}{\PYGZsh{}}\PYG{k}{Create} \PYG{n}{DB}
 \PYG{k}{CREATE} \PYG{k}{DATABASE} \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{geo\PYGZus{}cache}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{c+cm}{/*}\PYG{c+cm}{!40100 COLLATE \PYGZsq{}utf8\PYGZus{}unicode\PYGZus{}ci\PYGZsq{} }\PYG{c+cm}{*/}\PYG{p}{;}

 \PYG{o}{\PYGZsh{}}\PYG{n}{environment} \PYG{k}{table} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}} \PYG{n}{description} \PYG{k}{of} \PYG{n}{area} \PYG{k}{user} \PYG{k}{is} \PYG{n}{spotting} \PYG{k}{from}
 \PYG{k}{CREATE} \PYG{k}{TABLE} \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{environment}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{p}{(}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{environment\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{n}{AUTO\PYGZus{}INCREMENT}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{environment\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{VARCHAR}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{150}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{k}{DEFAULT} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Unnamed Location\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{k}{PRIMARY} \PYG{k}{KEY} \PYG{p}{(}\PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{environment\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{p}{)}
     \PYG{p}{)}


 \PYG{o}{\PYGZsh{}}\PYG{n}{category} \PYG{k}{table} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}} \PYG{n}{collective} \PYG{n}{name} \PYG{k}{for} \PYG{n}{objects}
 \PYG{k}{COMMENT}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Area category; description of area user is spotting from\PYGZsq{}}
 \PYG{k}{COLLATE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}utf8\PYGZus{}unicode\PYGZus{}ci\PYGZsq{}}
 \PYG{n}{ENGINE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{MyISAM}\PYG{p}{;}
 \PYG{k}{CREATE} \PYG{k}{TABLE} \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{category}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{p}{(}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{category\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{n}{AUTO\PYGZus{}INCREMENT}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{category\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{VARCHAR}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{150}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{k}{DEFAULT} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Unnamed category\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{k}{PRIMARY} \PYG{k}{KEY} \PYG{p}{(}\PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{category\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{p}{)}
     \PYG{p}{)}


 \PYG{k}{COMMENT}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Name for a collection of objects\PYGZsq{}}
 \PYG{k}{COLLATE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}utf8\PYGZus{}unicode\PYGZus{}ci\PYGZsq{}}
 \PYG{n}{ENGINE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{MyISAM}\PYG{p}{;}
 \PYG{o}{\PYGZsh{}}\PYG{k}{object} \PYG{k}{table} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}} \PYG{n}{definition} \PYG{k}{for} \PYG{n}{individual} \PYG{n}{objects}

     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{object\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{n}{AUTO\PYGZus{}INCREMENT}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{object\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{VARCHAR}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{150}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{k}{DEFAULT} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Unnamed Object\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{k}{PRIMARY} \PYG{k}{KEY} \PYG{p}{(}\PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{object\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{p}{)}
     \PYG{p}{)}


 \PYG{k}{COMMENT}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Living or inanimate object to record discovery of\PYGZsq{}}

 \PYG{n}{ENGINE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{MyISAM}\PYG{p}{;}
 \PYG{o}{\PYGZsh{}}\PYG{n}{Discovery} \PYG{k}{table} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}} \PYG{n}{individual} \PYG{n}{submissions} \PYG{k}{from} \PYG{n}{users}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{links} \PYG{n}{everything} \PYG{n}{together}

     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{discovery\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{n}{AUTO\PYGZus{}INCREMENT}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{environment\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{k}{DEFAULT} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}0\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{category\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{k}{DEFAULT} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}0\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
     \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{object\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{k}{DEFAULT} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}0\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}

     \PYG{p}{)}


     \PYG{k}{COMMENT}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}Table for recording individual discoveries of objects\PYGZsq{}}
     \PYG{k}{COLLATE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}utf8\PYGZus{}unicode\PYGZus{}ci\PYGZsq{}}
     \PYG{n}{ENGINE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{MyISAM}\PYG{p}{;}
     \PYG{o}{\PYGZsh{}}\PYG{n}{Describes} \PYG{k}{object} \PYG{n}{sizes}
     \PYG{k}{CREATE} \PYG{k}{TABLE} \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{object\PYGZus{}size}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{p}{(}
         \PYG{o}{{}`}\PYG{n}{object\PYGZus{}size\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{o}{{}`} \PYG{n+nb}{INT}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{NOT} \PYG{k}{NULL} \PYG{n}{AUTO\PYGZus{}INCREMENT}\PYG{p}{,}
